Bakwas tareen product hai 2 years ke warranty hai aur 2 maheeny bhe thk sy nhi chali.. I've contacted them to claim the warranty nd then they say we hage to visit one of their branches that are in Karachi, Lahore, Islamabad, Wah Cantt.. customer support service is pathetic too.. 
Aik dfa chz khareed le tou inko ghanta farq nhi prta chahy khrb ho kch bhe ho
